Sequence Information.Peptide Name: A30 C1 guan / Apidaecin O1 R10 guan, Api88

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Api88 is a novel antibacterial designer peptide to treat systemic infections with multidrug-resistant Gram-negative pathogens.
Literature.Author: Czihal P, Knappe D, Hoffmann R, et al.

Literature.Title: Insect-derived short proline-rich and murine cathelicidin-related antimicrobial peptides act synergistically on Gram-negative bacteria in vitro.
Literature.Author: Knappe D, Kabankov N, Herth N, Hoffmann R

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity and 70S Ribosome Binding of Apidaecin-Derived Api805 with Increased Bacterial Uptake Rate.
Literature.Author: Ludwig T, Krizsan A, Mohammed GK, Hoffmann R
